 Vi strävar efter att bli Sveriges bästa arbetsplats genom att uppskatta våra olikheter, ständigt blicka framåt och skapa en organisation som är lika modig som klok. Vår övertygelse är att tekniken ger oss oanade möjligheter – för att utveckla människor, skapa bättre affärer och bygga hållbara samhällen.
   

  

 Vi drivs av att förena människa och teknik och med gemensamma visioner och större ambitioner, stödjer vi en bred kundkrets på deras digitaliseringsresor. Genom våra partnerskap med Google och Microsoft ligger vi i teknisk framkant och erbjuder utmärkta förutsättningar för att hjälpa våra kunder med deras digitaliseringsprojekt.
   

  

**Forefront Act arbetar med förvaltning och förädling** 
 av våra kunders applikationer, produkter och tjänster. Vi bygger morgondagens förvaltningsorganisation med agila arbetssätt, molnbaserade lösningar och en stor portion glädje. För oss är förvaltning en förutsättning för innovation och utveckling. Vi är ett blandat gäng, men gemensamt drivs vi av utveckling och spännande uppdrag. Vår ambition är att skapa avtryck hos våra kunder och det är där vi växer som individer och utvecklare.
   

  

 Just nu får vi in flera spännande kunder och utökar vår position på marknaden. Häng med!
   

  

**Vi söker dig som är genuint intresserad av samspelet mellan människor och teknik.** 
 Som person är du engagerad och driven. Du är prestigelös och flexibel, kan förstå utmaningar ur flera perspektiv och tycker om att jobba med problemlösning. Du är kundorienterad, kreativ och inte rädd för att ta initiativ.
   

  

**Vi Tror Att Du Har**
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom utveckling och förvaltning
* God erfarenhet inom C#, .NET och/eller JavaScript
* Erfarenhet av liknande uppdrag i förvaltnings- och/eller utvecklingsteam på operativ nivå
* Bred erfarenhet av flera områden (arkitektur, ramverk, verktyg, struktur, lösning och driftsättning) i moderna utvecklingsmiljöer
* Relevant universitets eller högskoleutbildning
* Bra kommunikationsförmåga i både tal och skrift, på svenska och engelska


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Som utvecklare på Forefront Act får du möjlighet** 
 att underhålla och vidareutveckla etablerade system som spelar en viktig roll för våra kunders verksamhet. Du får arbeta med att identifiera och lösa problem, optimera prestanda och utveckla nya funktioner som möter användarnas behov. Du kommer också att samarbeta med andra utvecklare och tekniska experter för att leverera högkvalitativ kod och säkerställa en stabil driftmiljö. Genom dina insatser bidrar du till att säkra våra kunders framgång och tillväxt.

title: Senior Software Developer
company_industry: Financial Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**At Billogram, we like to be the good guys of billing—making money when clients are happy and pay on time, rather than from missed payments.** 
 We believe it always pays off to treat people well. That’s why our platform for invoices and payments is built to remove pain points and instead be beneficial to both our clients and their customers—improving their relationships.
 



  





 To support our growth and become a leader in the European consumer billing market, we are looking for a talented
 **Senior Software Developer** 
 with a background in payments to help us get there.
 



  





**About the Role:** 




 We’re looking for a Python Developer who’s excited by the challenge of rethinking how billing gets done. If you love collaborating with a diverse team, finding new angles to solve problems, and making an impact on real customer experiences, you’ll fit right in. You’ll join a friendly crew of developers, product managers, and other stakeholders who share a passion for building a platform that treats people well — and proves that great business grows from great relationships.
 



  





**What You’ll Do:** 



* **Standardize & Scale:** 
 Help shape a platform that’s ready to grow into new European markets. You’ll refactor, optimize, and test our systems so they can handle more transactions and delight more users.
* **Tackle Tech Debt:** 
 Fine-tune existing solutions so they run smoothly for larger clients, higher traffic, and increased complexity.
* **Create Real Value:** 
 Dive into coding, requirement analysis, and testing to build features that our clients — and their customers — will love.
* **Learn & Collaborate:** 
 Work side by side with other developers, share fresh ideas and keep our platform moving forward.



  





**What We’re Looking For:** 




 We want someone
 **humble, hungry, and happy** 
 : eager to grow, curious about how things can improve, and excited about shaping the future of billing. You enjoy discussing big ideas but are also comfortable rolling up your sleeves to make them happen.
 



  





**Key Qualifications** 



* **Python Expertise:** 
 At least 4 years of professional experience, ideally working on products with real-world impact.
* **Adaptability:** 
 Familiarity with PHP and an openness to learning new languages.
* **Product Mindset:** 
 Comfortable in a collaborative, product-focused environment, where everyone’s ideas matter.



  





**Bonus Skills** 



* **B2B & B2C Background:** 
 Experience building solutions for business and consumer needs.
* **Scaling Know-How** 
 : Exposure to international expansion or platforms that operate across borders.
* **Payment Experience** 
 : A couple of years (or more) dealing with payment systems, transactions, or other financial services.



  





**Why work with us?** 




 At Billogram we promise you an exciting journey as we break into new markets and grow at a rapid pace. That aside you will get lots of freedom and opportunity to develop together with great colleagues at our office, right in the center of Stockholm. We also offer flexible working hours, exciting challenges and a whole lot of laughs.
 



  





 We're committed to your long-term development, offering clear career progression paths. You'll also enjoy a fantastic benefits package, including 30 (+2) days of holiday, an occupational pension, a flexible wellness allowance, sick leave top-up, and parental leave compensation. At Billogram, our inclusive and diverse culture ensures that everyone can enjoy a fulfilling career and a great work-life balance.
 



  





 At Billogram, we provide equal opportunities and strive for an inclusive and diverse environment. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to gender, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other beliefs, disability, sexual orientation, or age.
 



  





**Welcome to the world of Billogram!**

title: Content Writer
description:
Are you that rare writer who’s both creative and logical? Do you enjoy research and problem solving as well as coming up with engaging copy?
 



  





 If you are, and also want to be part of driving innovation with us at House of Education, keep reading!
 



  





 We’re looking for a Content Writer who isn’t just your typical creative writer. For this role you need to be more. A logical mindset and an ability to be structured – while also continuously learning new things on a weekly basis through research – is paramount. 
 



  





 Listed as one of Sweden’s top 90 scale-up companies, we're experiencing an exciting growth phase. You’ll have a key role in a team of ambitious individuals creating content for our award-winning product that is used by some of the largest universities across Europe. 
 



  





 We’re open to flexible working arrangements, but we’d like to see you in our Södermalm office in central Stockholm sometimes as well. We’re very proud of our international diversity and our working language is English.
 



  





 This position will take ownership of our flagship products, which are custom-made quizzes helping universities and prospective students find each other. You’ll research universities and programs – translating complex information into engaging, user-focused questions and feedback. In addition, you’ll employ your logical abilities to make sure the content you create leads to the appropriate results using our customized quiz creation tool.
 



  





**Your responsibilities will include:** 




  




* Research
* Deep-diving into university websites and materials to understand and refine the information.
* Taking client meetings to understand programs and client goals for the product.
* Content development
* Using your research to write short-form copy for our products (the content must be mobile-first, engaging, and clear).
* Structuring quizzes thinking about things like question order and flow.
* Creating content with purpose making sure there’s a reason behind every question and answer.
* Testing quizzes ensuring the logic is correct.
* Managing quiz quality checks by leading team members in QA.



  





**Requirements:** 




  




* Based in Stockholm, Sweden (hybrid work model)
* Native/native level English speaker
* At least three years experience working with writing in a more technical capacity and/or technical environment (e.g. technical writing, content design for a tech company, conversation design/chatbot)



  





**Skills and traits that we’re looking for in an ideal candidate include:** 




  




* Experience meeting deadlines and juggling multiple projects
* Ability to write concise, grammatically correct and engaging copy
* Ability to write for conversion (keeping users engaged)
* Curious and enthusiastic learner
* Interest in higher education



  





 If you think you might have the skills and passion to join our team as Content Writer, please send us your application today!

title: Tech Lead Manager - Hybrid - Stockholm
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 You will act as both Tech Lead and Manager, in a perfect mix of leading people (Team of Developers) and developing code. Our aim is to consolidate the team of developers that you will lead in Stockholm. You will collaborate with your Product Partner, regarding planning and building the right products at the right time. You will be responsible for defining clear goals for your team and lead them in delivering on those goals.
   

  

 Apart from this, you are also responsible for setting salaries, helping individuals on your team grow and developing, as well as contributing technically to the team.
   

  

 As Tech Lead Manager you have a holistic perspective and the ability to inspire and lead others. You love working with tech and have experience working as a developer, working with code reviews, testing and quality assurance. You have at least one area where your team can rely on you making strong technical contributions.
   

  

* Communicate and collaborate with stakeholders
* Define quarterly goals and do weekly follow-ups
* Support and make sure the team members are the best they can be
* Develop and coach your team members individually
* Facilitate daily stand-ups and advise on agile WoW
* Contribute technically (wherever your strong area is) to the team


**Requirements**
* MSc/BS in computer science or similar degree
* Experience working as a Manager for a Tech Team
* Working in different contexts and organisations
* Interest in leadership and developing teams
* Proficient in English, both verbal and written
* Business minded and able to see the big picture
* A natural leader who is caring and inspiring
* Able to communicate clearly, both with your team and stakeholders
* Well organized and goal oriented


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Fullstack Engineer - Subscriptions R&D
description:
The Markets & Subscriptions team oversees the entire user journey on Spotify and ensures we engage with people in innovative ways, every step of the way. Our team grows Spotify’s audience by finding future listeners around the world and delivering the right value to them, at the right time. With research, product development, product design, engineering, and marketing all collaborating in one organization, we’re able to quickly create meaningful features and services for millions of people around the world, resulting in joyful, long-lasting relationships with Spotify.
   

  

 We are looking for a mid-level Fullstack Engineer to join a cross-functional team of data scientists, mobile, web and backend engineers to create custom tailored user flows through personalization. Our team ensures customers realize value throughout their Spotify journey. We deliver personalized experiences that help customers discover new and exciting features and get the most out of their subscription. You will have the opportunity to have a significant impact on Spotify’s growth and revenue by reaching new users, markets and audiences. We achieve this by truly understanding the needs of our users, and by innovating and experimenting to solve real problems for them, building solutions across the entire Spotify infrastructure to support our goal.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Drive key architectural decisions across the stack - client, backend, data and quality.
* Be hands on and deliver on complex backend and frontend tasks.
* Work with other engineers on the team to adopt best practices and improve the quality of our solutions.
* Adopt a data first mindset, producing high-quality data about user interactions and leveraging experimentation to measure the impact of new features.
* Drive collaboration within agile teams of engineers, Data Scientists, Product Managers and Product Designers to build new product features.
* Develop individually to continue to grow your impact and help mentor peers.


 Who You Are
   

  

* You are experienced in designing and delivering backend applications in Java.
* You have a working knowledge in developing web applications in React, TypeScript and NextJS.
* You have a growth mindset, are curious and not afraid to be experimental. You share your ideas and continuously improve yourself and the team around you.
* You care about agile software development and a culture of constant learning and improvement.
* You have excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, and can communicate your ideas.
* Experience with Conversion and Retention is a plus!


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role is based in London (UK), or Stockholm (Sweden).
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home.


 Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Financial Accountant
description:
**About Us**
 Legora is working to empower lawyers and automate legal work. Our approach is to enable the lawyer of the future: a human-AI lawyer who's an order of magnitude more effective than a team of conventional legal professionals. The human-AI lawyer will iterate at the speed of their judgment, even in the most complex legal scenarios, and will out-smart and out-deliver the best pure AI system.
   

  

 You are joining an early-stage scale-up with exceptional product-market fit that thousands of lawyers use daily at global institutions such as Bird&Bird, Mannheimer Swartling, and Heineken. Backed by $37M in funding from top investors like Benchmark, Redpoint, and Y Combinator, Leya is a group of exceptional engineers, lawyers, and doers. Here, you will have infinite room to grow and rethink how truly worthwhile work gets done.
   

  

**The Role**
 We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive senior accountant to join our finance team in building a multientity fast growing scale up. You will be part of our Finance team in the Stockholm office and will be managing a wide array of financial tasks, from performing book closing activities to ensuring accurate invoicing and payments across Legora’s group entities. You will work continuously with optimising and improving our financial processes to ensure Legora’s financial results are delivered with high quality to stakeholders on time. This role requires strong organizational and people skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.
   

  

**In Short, Your Key Responsibilities Will Be**
* Have full ownership over our quote to cash process, collaborating closely with our growth and product analytics team to ensure billings are processed accurately and according to contractual agreements.
* Together with Revenue Operations, ensure that the billing infrastructure is up to date with Legora’s product and pricing
* Manage day-to-day processes such as accounts payable, expense management and weekly payments
* Perform book closing activities including general ledger entries and balance sheet reconciliations
* Filing and reporting VAT and other necessary statutory filings in the different jurisdictions, to date Sweden, UK and US.
* Assist in preparing annual reports, statutory filings and other necessary documentation for external stakeholders
* Analyse monthly results and create periodical entries
* Develop and improve financial processes
* Assist in global expansion activities
* Assist in audit processes


**Who You Are**
* Integrity: You will be at the centre of Legora’s operations, entrusted with large autonomy and access to sensitive information. Your role relies on unquestionable integrity, trust, and transparency with the team and management. You ensure ethical financial practices are upheld within the organization, promoting accountability and adherence to financial laws and standards.
* Diligent: You take end-to-end ownership of our financial data and stack, paying attention to every detail.
* Autonomous: Although constantly working in a team, we believe in self-leadership and ownership! You value feedback, take initiative without needing direction, and focus on outcomes. You are not afraid to try new things and learn from your mistakes rather than play it safe.
* Entrepreneurial: Legora is an ambitious start-up. Things move fast, tasks and challenges may be demanding, and responsibilities may change over time. But you’ll get to work with a team of brilliant and dedicated people who are all working to solve difficult problems and really change how legal work is done.


**Qualifications & Skills**
* Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field.
* 4-6 years of experience in finance, accounting, or a related role.
* You possess a strong foundation in financial principles – such as Swedish GAAP, IFRS and US GAAP.
* Experience of working independently with monthly closing and reporting, incl. annual reports.
* Strong understanding of billing and financial processes.
* Experience in accounting software (e.g., Fortnox, QuickBooks, SAP, NetSuite, D365) and Microsoft Excel.
* Excellent organizational and multitasking skills.
* Strong communication skills for coordination with global teams.
* High attention to detail and problem-solving abilities.
* Experience with Swedish and US GAAP
* Proficiency in SQL is good to have


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience working with international accounting firms.
* Prior experience in a multinational or corporate finance environment.


**Practical Information**
* Career development opportunities in a rapidly evolving entrepreneurial environment.
* A collaborative, high-energy team environment where your ideas and contributions are valued and implemented.
* Competitive salary complemented with a transparent and highly competitive options program.
* Centrally located offices in Stockholm, designed as a space for you to do your life's work.


 We founded Legora with the vision of giving lawyers the tools they deserve.
   

  

 We didn't build Legora for how law is practiced today; we built it for how it should be practiced tomorrow.

title: Content Designer - Paid summer Internship
description:
**Join Kodiak Hub** 
**🐻🚀** 
**as we aid global companies to create smarter & more sustainable supply chains at scale.**




**Who we are** 




 Kodiak Hub is a growth venture offering SaaS solutions engineered to revolutionize Supplier Relationship Management (SRM). We are building the next generation of B2B SaaS, based on business intelligence, automation, big data analytics, and machine learning technology, creating a blueprint of how companies optimize their interaction and collaboration with suppliers.
 



 Our team is international and tight-knit, composed of competent and creative individuals. We double our revenue on a yearly basis, and we have an aggressive yet realistic growth model for the following years. As our product is completely novel, we are constantly figuring out innovative solutions to the market's challenges.
 



 Join us and help us change the way companies operate in their global supply chains!
 



**We have an opening for an internship as a Content Designer!** 




 Detail-Oriented, Design Savvy, and a True Storyteller.
   

 We’re now looking to complement our Product team with an
 **internship** 
 as
 **Content Designer** 
 who thrives on turning complex information into clear, on-brand visuals and experiences.
 



 Are you a “make-it-make-sense” kind of person, passionate about design, tone, and consistency in communication? Then we’d love to hear from you!
 



**As a Content Designer, you will be responsible for successfully:** 



* **Creating product-facing materials** 
 like diagrams, slide decks, and visual demos based on product requirements and brand guidelines
* **Maintaining consistency** 
 in tone, structure, and visual style across product communication
* **Developing templates and reusable assets** 
 for internal and external use
* **Ensuring clarity** 
 and accessibility in user-facing documentation and visuals
* **Collaborating across teams** 
 to bring technical ideas to life visually
* **Reviewing and iterating** 
 on content based on user and stakeholder feedback



**Candidates' Requirements & Attributes:** 



* Knowledge of design and presentation tools (e.g., Figma, FigJam, PowerPoint)
* Knowledge in video creation and editing
* Fluency in professional English
* Studies in Communication, Design, Media, or a related field
* Bonus: Experience with UX writing, video editing, or interactive content is a plus



 Want to turn innovative ideas into engaging content that empowers users and showcases product value?
 



**Start date: 2025-06-23** 




**End** 
**date: 2025-08-29** 




  

**Come build with us.**
 Apply now with your portfolio and become a part of the Kodiak Hub Sleuth 🐻✨

title: Financial Controller
description:
Join us as a Financial controller, Nordisk Renting
   

  

* You will work with the financial controlling activities with several entities within Nordisk Renting.
* Nordisk Renting offers structured asset financing through leasing of commercial properties in the Nordic region, mainly targeting the corporate and public sector segment.


 What you'll do
   

  

 With exciting expansion plans, we are looking for a Financial controller based in our Stockholm office with responsibility for handling the accounting, financial reporting and controlling activities for entities in the Nordisk Renting Group. You will provide analytical financial insights to support decision-making.
   

  

**In Addition, You’ll**
* Maintaining accurate financial records and producing of financial reports
* Month end closing activities including balance sheet reconciliations and analysis of P&L
* Ensure accuracy and completeness in financial accounting
* Manage the external audit process
* Ensure compliance with accounting standards
* Continuous improve the Finance activities and challenge established processes


 The skills you'll need
   

  

 To succeed in this role, you’ll need at least 5 years of relevant experience within a Finance organisation with experience within financial controlling and accounting,
   

  

**Additionally, You’ll Need**
* Relevant education from the University or similar education.
* Good knowledge of ERP systems and strong Excel skills.
* Experience from a BI tool, preferrable PowerBI.
* You are a motivated and proactive self-starter
* You like to drive continuous improvement and challenge processes
* Good problem solver with analytical skills


**What Else You Need To Know**
 CVs must be submitted in English. Fluent Swedish and English are required and also basic knowledge in Finnish.

title: VP of Product
description:
**Oneflow is a rapidly growing tech scale-up located in the heart of Stockholm. We have created a platform that automates the entire contract process from start to finish, all in one place. Turning clunky, static contracts into customer-oriented, digital contracts that feel like magic.** 




 As VP of Product, you’ll oversee the strategy, development, and execution of Oneflow’s product and user experience efforts. You’ll lead and grow a talented team of Product Managers, UX Designers, Customer Support Agents, and Data Analysts, ensuring they work together seamlessly to create products that deliver real value to our customers and the business. Reporting directly to our CEO, you’ll collaborate across the organisation with engineering, marketing, sales, and customer success to align efforts with our product vision and strategy.
 



**Here’s how you’ll make an impact:** 



* You’ll mentor and guide a multidisciplinary team of Product Managers and UX Designers, Data Analysts and the Customer Support Agents, empowering them to deliver innovative solutions that drive growth and customer satisfaction.
* You’ll champion both product discovery and delivery, balancing fast-paced execution with business insights, continuous discovery, and data-driven decision-making.
* You’ll ensure our product strategies align with customer needs and business goals.
* You’ll foster seamless collaboration between PMs, UX designers, engineers, and other stakeholders, building a shared understanding of priorities and ensuring smooth operations.
* You’ll lead product strategy and execution, focusing on impactful delivery and business insights to drive product growth and performance.
* You’ll drive the evolution of our design system and UX principles, ensuring we deliver a cohesive, delightful experience across the user journey.
* Success in this role means delivering products that are intuitive and valuable, while fostering a collaborative and high-performing team culture.



**Who you are** 




 You’re a passionate leader who thrives at the intersection of product strategy and tactics. With deep expertise in product development and design, you know how to balance customer needs with business priorities. You’re as comfortable coaching your team as you are engaging directly with customers or leading strategic initiatives. You believe that great products are born from strong teamwork, business insights, and data-driven decisions. Also:
 


* You inspire and motivate teams to think big while keeping a keen eye on the tactical steps needed to achieve results.
* You thrive on understanding customer needs and championing them in product strategies, specifically in the B2B SaaS space.
* You excel at building relationships across teams, fostering trust and alignment between Product, Engineering, and commercial teams.
* You’re skilled at connecting data-driven insights with creative problem-solving to drive impactful decisions.
* You understand the power of product design to differentiate a product and ensure exceptional customer experiences.



**Your background** 



* 5+ years of leadership experience in SaaS Product Management and product design.
* Hands-on experience with technical B2B SaaS products, preferably with exposure to both growth motions (PLG, PLS) and customer success-driven models.
* A strong grasp of product discovery and delivery methodologies, including design thinking, user research, and data analysis.
* You love building things and have worked in multiple startups or scaleups.
* A track record of coaching teams to achieve strategic goals and personal growth.
* A collaborative, empathetic leadership style that values transparency and trust.
* It’s beneficial if you come from an engineering background, bringing a technical perspective to product leadership.



**Come work with us** 




 We value gender equality and diversity in organisation, so we strive for a team that reflects the diversity in today's society. At Oneflow we currently have 34 nationalities and are proud of an extremely diverse workplace. Our recruitment is based on competence.
 



 The recruitment process begins with an interview with Aleksandra from the Talent Acquisition team. Next, you will complete a personality and logic test, followed by a meeting with the hiring managers. Finally, you will prepare for an assignment and participate in a case interview.
 



**We can’t wait to meet you! 
 **🎉****




 Visit our website for more information about our product and Oneflow. Visit our career page for more information about our culture and future colleagues. 💜

title: Fazer Business Graduate Program
description:
**Fazer Business Graduate Program** 




  





**Are you ready to kick-start your career and become a future business leader, driving the next chapter of Fazer’s success?** 




  





 Fazer Business Graduate Program offers you a unique growth path by giving you the possibility to learn and challenge yourself. You will grow as a professional and gain valuable experience and memorable moments while expanding your professional network in one of the most iconic consumer brands in the Nordics. We are looking for newly graduated or soon to graduate team players with a higher academic degree to take this first step towards a career at Fazer.
 



  





**Program structure** 



* Permanent position with all Fazer employee benefits
* 24-month programme, including three 8-month rotations through key business areas: marketing, sales and finance
* One rotation abroad (outside your home country) to gain international exposure
* Personal mentor, buddy support and tailored coaching throughout the program



  





**Why choose Fazer?** 




  





 As a business graduate at Fazer, you will take on challenging roles across different teams and business units. Independent projects and real responsibilities provide an excellent foundation for growth and a fast track to becoming top talent in business. You will be surrounded by experienced, committed and inspiring colleagues, and build a strong professional network through collaboration with other graduates, colleagues and partners across functions.
 



 You will contribute to building our iconic brands and developing innovative, sustainable food solutions that create meaningful moments in everyday life. At Fazer, everyone can make an impact – we are a forward-looking, creative industry leader. You will be part of an inclusive and collaborative culture that values authenticity and empowers people to reach their full potential. We grow, learn and succeed together.
 



  





 Learn more what our colleagues are saying about working at Fazer!
 



  





**What will you bring to the team?** 




  





 You are a development-minded team player with solid analytical competence. You have good collaboration and interpersonal skills combined with competence and mindset to develop business and yourself. You act proactively with high ambition to grow as a professional in business, even though you know it sometimes takes stamina and resilience to get there. You are willing and able to regularly rotate between roles, teams, and locations. Excellent written and spoken communication skills in English are a must. You have completed or will soon complete your first higher academic degree in a relevant field (e.g. business, sales, marketing or economics) with no more than two years since graduation.
 



  





**Apply now to create moments that matter.** 




  





 Please fill in the application form, attach your CV and a short video
 **by April 27th.** 




  





 Please note that in addition to this opportunity in Sweden, a parallel graduate recruitment process is currently ongoing in
 
 Finland
 
 . You may choose to apply to the location that best suits your preferences and mobility.
 



  





 The selection process will include assessments, interviews and assignments during May. The program will start in early September 2025.
 



  





 In questions regarding the recruitment process, please contact our recruitment team at
 
 recruitment@fazer.com
 
 .
 



  





  





*Fazer, The Food Experience Company, enables people to enjoy the best moments of their day. Our mission, Food with a purpose, builds on our strong more than 130-year heritage, consumer first approach and innovations to create the sustainable food solutions of the future. With our dedicated team of approximately 5,000 professionals, we focus on fast-moving consumer goods and our direct-to-consumer business in Northern Europe, and beyond with exports to more than 40 countries. Fazer’s operations comply with its Code of Conduct that is based on the Group’s values and the UN Global Compact. In 2024, Fazer Group had net sales of 1,200 million euros.* 




  





*Northern Magic. Made Real.*

title: Chief Operating Officer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Tobii Dynavox® is the market leader in assistive technology for communication, offering custom designed communication aids and support systems for people with disabilities such as cerebral palsy, ALS, autism, and aphasia. The company empowers individuals to communicate and live their lives to the fullest, promoting independence and inclusion. With a global presence and a focus on addressing the unmet need for communication aids, Tobii Dynavox makes a significant impact on individuals, communities, healthcare systems, and society at large.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 Dynavox Group is seeking our next visionary COO to drive operational excellence and global growth. This role is pivotal in managing our supply chain, production, logistics, quality and regulatory assurance for medical devices, and digital transformation, while ensuring a smooth leadership transition as our current COO prepares for retirement.
 



 You will oversee vendor management, negotiate contracts, and implement strategies to reduce risks and cut costs. Additionally, you will lead production processes, global shipping, quality assurance for med-class devices, and warehouse operations, while serving as the primary local spokesperson and culture ambassador for our North American team. 
 



  





 Qualifications & Personal Attributes: 
 


* Experience: 10+ years in operations management with 5+ years in senior leadership within multinational organizations. Experience of automation and moving a global operations organization to the next level.
* Education: Bachelor’s in Business Administration, Operations Management, or a related field; Master’s preferred.
* Skills: Strong leadership, strategic thinking, global vendor management with suppliers outside US and preferably within the APAC region, production oversight, quality and regulatory oversight for med class products, and financial planning. Proficiency in digital technologies (ERP, AI, supplier integration) is essential.
* If you are ready to lead transformative change, scale global operations, and build a legacy of excellence, we invite you to join our executive team. Your leadership will directly impact our journey toward operational innovation and sustainable growth.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Experience in operational management, strategic planning, and resource allocation
* Leadership skills in managing cross-functional teams and driving performance
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills for effective collaboration
* Analytical and problem-solving abilities for decision-making and process optimization
* Knowledge of the assistive technology industry or related fields is a plus
* Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field

title: Customer Advisor
description:
**The Company** 




 We are Zeekr, built on a decade of European experience. We are a premium electric vehicle and technology solutions brand from Geely Holding Group, one of world’s largest automotive companies. Our goal and vision is to accelerate the shift to fully electrified mobility. We are committed to driving the future of transportation with cutting-edge technology and a customer-centric approach.
   





**The role**




 Here at Zeekr we are hiring a Customer Advisor to create and deliver memorable customer experiences, whilst maximizing the sales of Zeekr EVs. Together with the team you create a customer-centric atmosphere at Zeekr. You make customers feel welcome and supported during the customer journey.
 



**This is what you will do most of the time:** 



* Be the expert on Zeekr products and services and provide a great customer experience.
* Whether it concerns the cars, electric driving in practice, charging at home and on the road, connectivity and financing, the customer can come to you for everything.
* Remain informed of the latest product information and ZEEKR's distinctive character compared to the competition and are able to communicate changes and updates to other colleagues and customers.
* Enthusiastically demonstrate our cars, provide product information and manage test drives.
* Support the customer during all steps in the purchasing process, both in the store and online.
* Build strong customer relationships by providing excellent customer service and maintaining regular and proactive contact.
* Participate in events at an external location, to meet new customers and present our products and brand.



**To be successful in the role you will demonstrate:** 



* Experience in a customer-facing sales role, and a proactive approach to sales.
* A customer-oriented mindset with a strong understanding of sales processes and customer satisfaction principles.
* A high school diploma or equivalent is required, and experience in a relationship-building customer service role.
* Effective communication and interpersonal skills to deal successfully with customers and colleagues.
* Collaborative with the ability to work well in a team with colleagues from different departments.
* Good knowledge of the Microsoft Office package, as well as fluent in English and Swedish, both spoken and written.
* A valid driver's license is essential for conducting test drives and effectively assisting customers.



 To thrive at Zeekr we believe that you have the courage to lead with trust and care and you don’t mind getting your hands dirty. You are highly innovative and have a great ability to adapt and perform in a constantly changing, fast-paced, highly demanding work environment. Like us, you believe it’s important to have a passion to work in an international and multicultural environment with the desire and ability to embrace the diversity of people, perspectives, and styles.
   





*Apply today, we will perform ongoing selection during the application period. We look forward to hearing from you.* 




*Please note that due to GDPR regulations we can only accept applications sent through the recruitment system, not via email or other channels. We do not accept applications submitted by external recruitment companies.*

title: Head of Business Operations (m/f/x) - Nordics
description:
To strengthen our
 **Commercial Organization** 
 , we are currently hiring a
   

  

 Head of Business Operations (m/f/x) - Nordics
   

  

 (Fulltime / permanent / Location: Danderyd)
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 Join our team as the Head of Business Operations in Sweden and drive the success of our innovative healthcare solutions. This critical role involves leading a team focused on Demand Planning and Product Supply, Customer Service and Distribution, and Operational and Commercial Excellence. Your goal will be to enhance processes in these areas, contributing to the achievement of ambitious revenue goals for the region. You will be part of the Nordic Leadership team.
   

  

**The Role**
* Lead and manage a diverse team of professionals, fostering a high-performance culture and promoting individual growth and development.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to align strategies and ensure effective implementation, inspiring the future and ensuring team buy-in.
* Oversee the product demand and supply process, ensuring monthly updates with all business areas and European/Global planners, and maintaining a solid product supply situation.
* Manage the Nordic supply chain.
* Identify and prioritize service improvement opportunities and create plans for implementation, building bridges and proactively improving cross-business collaboration.
* Interact with distributors across the Nordic region.
* Develop strategies and recommendations for improving processes, efficiency, and practices, leveraging current and future IT systems.
* Develop a state-of-the-art performance and commercial excellence strategy.
* Develop and implement salesforce effectiveness data, sales operations policies and procedures, and best practices to ensure compliance and consistency across the organization, in cooperation with the Head of Sales.


**Your Skills And Experience**
* University degree, preferably in business, data management, science, or engineering.
* 5+ years of experience in Demand Planning/Product Supply, Operational Management, Data Management, and Commercial Excellence.
* Experience with digital marketing generated from CRM systems.
* Knowledge of PowerBI or similar systems is beneficial.
* Fluent in both spoken and written English.
* Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and preferably also Veeva/Salesforce as a CRM system.
* High digital and adoption skills for new technology are highly valued.


**Reporting Relationships**
* Reports to: General Manager – Nordics
* Direct reports: Customer Service Manager, Regional Demand Planner, Sales Coordinator, Business Operations & Tender Analyst


**What We Offer**
* Comprehensive benefit plan with options including medical plans, life insurance, and retirement plans.
* Two additional leave days for your personal wellbeing.
* Learning opportunities with our CSL Academy.
* Find Diversity, Equality, and Inclusion at all sites and with every colleague. Come as you are.


 Join us and contribute to making a difference in the lives of patients with rare diseases. Apply today!
   

  

**Our Benefits**
 We encourage you to make your well-being a priority. It’s important and so are you. Learn more about how we care at CSL.
   

  

**About CSL Behring**
 CSL Behring is a global leader in developing and delivering high-quality medicines that treat people with rare and serious diseases. Our treatments offer promise for people in more than 100 countries living with conditions in the immunology, hematology, cardiovascular and metabolic, respiratory, and transplant therapeutic areas. Learn more about CSL Behring.
   

  

**We want CSL to reflect the world around us**
 As a global organization with employees in 35+ countries, CSL embraces diversity and inclusion. Learn more about Diversity & Inclusion at CSL.
   

  

**Do work that matters at CSL Behring!**

title: Recruiter
description:
**Om rollen** 




  





 Vi söker en engagerad och resultatfokuserad
 **rekryterare** 
 som vill vara med och fortsätta bygga upp vårt team av fantastiska psykologer. Du kommer att ansvara för hela rekryteringsprocessen – från funnelaktiviteter till signerat avtal – med fokus på att attrahera, identifiera och rekrytera legitimerade psykologer till vår verksamhet. Rollen skiljer sig något från en traditionell rekryterare som primärt letar kandidater till ett kontor. I den här rollen kommer du att rekrytera många personer varje månad, så du behöver vara van att hantera 10+ kandidater samtidigt i olika steg parallellt med att du ansvarar för att vi får in nog många ansökningar. Du hittar energi i att kontakta och intervjua kandidater, men har också strukturen som krävs för att på ett personligt och professionellt vis leda varje kandidat genom processen.
 



  





**Om bolaget** 




  





 Din Psykolog bedriver vård genom en plattform där patienter träffar psykologer digitalt. Bolaget har vuxit snabbt och har idag cirka 100 psykologer anställda. Genom att kombinera högkompetenta psykologer med innovativ teknik skapar vi en unik möjlighet att hjälpa patienter med deras mentala hälsa.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter:** 




  




* Ansvara för hela rekryteringsprocessen: annonsering, urval, intervjuer, referenstagning och anställning.
* Arbeta proaktivt med search och talent acquisition – du vet var psykologerna finns och hur man når dem.
* Bygga och underhålla relationer med potentiella kandidater och skapa en stark pipeline.
* Samarbeta med övriga interna stakeholders för att förstå behov och kravprofiler.
* Ansvara för employer branding-initiativ riktade mot psykologer.
* Säkerställa en professionell och positiv kandidatupplevelse genom hela processen.
* Hålla koll på trender och förändringar inom branschen och anpassa rekryteringsstrategin därefter.



  





**Vi tror att du har:** 




  




* Tidigare erfarenhet av rekrytering, gärna inom vård, hälsa eller annan kunskapsintensiv bransch.
* God förståelse för psykologers utbildning, kompetens och yrkesroll.
* Starka kommunikativa färdigheter och en förmåga att bygga förtroende snabbt.
* Ett strukturerat arbetssätt och vana av att hantera flera parallella processer.



  





**Meriterande:** 




  




* Erfarenhet av rekrytering inom hälso- och sjukvård.
* Erfarenhet av search och LinkedIn Recruiter.
* Kunskap om marknadsföring och employer branding.



  





**Personliga egenskaper:** 




  




* Relationsbyggare ut i fingerspetsarna.
* Strukturerad för att kunna hålla koll på alla kandidater och processer.
* Självständig och initiativtagande.
* Affärsmässig och resultatinriktad.
* Flexibel och lösningsorienterad.

title: Product Manager focusing on market infrastructure | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Investor Services is part of the division Corporate & Institutional Banking and a cornerstone of SEB’s offering to Financial Institutions and Banks. Investor Services Banks provides Cash and Sub Custody services to SEB’s Bank clients. We are the dominant sub custodian in the Nordic markets, with a critical role in the region’s post-trade securities services. We are recruiting a Product Manager.
   

  

**About The Role**
 The Product Management team is currently composed of eight product managers based in Stockholm, two in Copenhagen, one in Helsinki and one in Oslo, as well as three product specialists all based in Stockholm. Your primary responsibility as Product Manager will be to work cross-products, focusing on market infrastructure. You will work closely with the head of Product Management and your colleagues in the team, primarily the Product Manager and Specialist for Securities Settlement.
   

  

**The Role Includes The Following**
* Support the head of Product Management with monitoring and influencing cross-product market infrastructure changes, primarily in Sweden but also in the other three Nordic markets
* Support the Product Manager for Sub Custody Settlement with the upcoming settlement-related changes to market infrastructure
* Work with other members of the Sub Custody Tribe, from Technology, Operations and Investor Services Banks, on a cross-product delivery to our Sub Custody clients
* Participate in relevant external and internal groups and initiatives related to Sub Custody and market infrastructure changes


 You will be located in Stockholm (Arenastaden in Solna) and report to the head of Investor Services Banks Product Management.
   

  

**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Multiple years of experience of working with post-trade services, preferably custody or other services to international banks, in one or more of the Nordic markets
* A flexible, service-oriented, delivery-focused mindset, and are comfortable with a collaborative and iterative development approach, working with both Tech and business staff
* The ability to be the driver of your own initiatives and also support others in theirs
* Experience with agile IT development
* Good communication skills, both verbally and in written form in English and Swedish


**What We Offer**
* An attractive and international working environment
* A team of experienced colleagues that are ready to support you in your own development and that of our products and services
* Close collaboration with all units of the Cash and Sub Custody delivery, from Investor Services Banks in the Nordic markets to Business Services and Technology
* Opportunities for hybrid work and flexibility


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than 2 May 2025. If you have questions about the position, please contact Christine Strandberg at christine.strandberg@seb.se. We will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Communications Manager
description:
**Why Join Us?**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. We call this mission Power to Be You. Our assistive communication technology helps our customers express themselves, connect with the world, and pursue independence, whether through everyday activities like ordering food or extraordinary feats like running a company. Working at Tobii Dynavox, you’ll become part of a team that spans the globe, with offices in the US, Sweden, France, the UK, China, and beyond.
   

  

 To learn more about what we make possible, meet some of our customers or take a look at some of our solutions.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 As a Communications Manager at Tobii Dynavox, you will play a key role in supporting our company vision (a world where everyone can communicate) through effective communication initiatives. Your efforts will be directed towards key target groups, including media, investors, customers, and internal audiences.
   

  

 If you are an approachable, collaborative and reliable networker who enjoys building internal relationships and is enthusiastic about all kinds of communication and storytelling work, we have the perfect opportunity for you where you can use your proactive and creative mindset to develop new compelling stories for both external and internal audiences!
   

  

**Please note:** 
 This is a full-time, permanent and
 **hybrid** 
 role with 2-3 days per week at our office in Stockholm city. This role also includes occasional (10%) international travel, which would be communicated weeks in advance.
   

  

**In this role, you will:**
* Develop and execute comprehensive communication plans that align with our business strategy and goals.
* Create engaging content for various internal and external audiences and platforms, including financial communication.
* Collaborate with internal teams to ensure consistent messaging across all channels.
* Support community engagement initiatives, helping to foster brand loyalty and maintain active relationships with target audiences.
* Work closely together with People and Sustainability team on ongoing internal communication and employer branding initiatives.
* Manage the intranet platform to ensure effective internal communication.
* Monitor and analyze communication metrics to optimize our strategies.


**What We're Looking For:**
 We are looking for someone that has:
   

  

* Equivalent of a Bachelor’s degree in Communications, Public Relations, journalism, or a related field.
* Ability to create and execute on communications plans, with a minimum of 5 years of experience in Communications-related roles.
* Advanced writing, editing, and verbal communication skills in both Business English and Swedish.
* Experience from working with financial communication in a publicly listed company.
* Strong understanding of social media and other digital communication channels.
* Experience from working with platforms for collaboration, digital asset management and publishing such as SharePoint, Teams, Favro, Bynder and Sprout.
* Excellent stakeholder management skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment with a service-minded, hands-on approach.


**Our Values:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, our mission guides what we do, and our values guide us in how we do it. Across the organization, we are committed to being Collaborative, Considerate, Curious and Courageous. We build a trusting environment where every team member prioritizes our customers with empathy and insight. Bold ideas and learning lead to impactful solutions. Driven by curiosity, we continuously challenge the status quo to create meaningful, customer-focused solutions for our customers.
   

  

**What We Offer:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we believe in empowering individuals – including our employees - to reach their full potential. Here’s what makes us unique:
   

  

* Purpose-Driven Work: Join a company that transforms lives by giving a voice to those with communication challenges. Every day, your work makes a meaningful and concrete impact.
* “Yes, and...” Flexibility: Build a rewarding career AND enjoy time with loved ones. We offer flexible work options so you don’t have to choose between personal and professional goals.
* Growth and Development: Whether you’re advancing your skills or growing your career, we invest in your future with training, learning opportunities, and internal growth paths.
* Inclusive and Supportive Culture: Work in a collaborative, caring environment where diversity and individuality are valued. You’ll feel connected to both your team and our global community.
* A Global Leader with Heart: Be part of an innovative, forward-thinking company that combines experience and cutting-edge solutions with a mission to change lives.

title: Lead System Developer
company_industry: Public Safety, Information Services, and Public Health
description:
*På SOS Alarm har vi ett viktigt uppdrag: att skapa trygghet för alla, dygnet runt, året om. Vi utvecklar smarta lösningar och tjänster som stärker samhällets förmåga att hantera kriser, olyckor och nödsituationer.* 




  





*Vill du arbeta i en nyckelroll där din tekniska kompetens gör konkret samhällsnytta?* 




*På SOS Alarm får du vara med och bygga robusta, pålitliga system som räddar liv. Vi söker nu en Systemarkitekt som vill vara med och utveckla våra viktiga Automatlarm.* 




  





  





  





**Din vardag hos oss** 




 Hos oss kommer du att ha en central och avgörande roll i vår tekniska miljö.
 



  





**I rollen kommer du bland annat att:** 




  




* Utveckla och vidareutveckla kod och arkitektur för våra samhällsviktiga kärnsystem, där robusthet och säkerhet är högsta prioritet.



  




* Omvandla verksamhetens krav till en tekniskt hållbar systemarkitektur och säkerställa att lösningarna möter såväl dagens som morgondagens behov.



  




* Stötta våra utvecklingsteam genom att skapa tydliga riktlinjer och best practices inom utveckling, integration och infrastruktur.



  




* Bistå med expertis kring integrationer, API:er och systeminfrastruktur i både Azure-molnmiljö och on-prem-lösningar.



  




* Samarbeta tätt med andra roller i teamet för att optimera vårt releaseförfarande och bidra till en smidig och stabil drift av våra system.



  





  





 Våra system byggs primärt i .NET/C# (backend) och Angular (Frontend/webb). Vi arbetar i Microsoftmiljöer, primärt med onpremlösningar men även Azure förekommer.
 



  





  





**Vad vi erbjuder dig:** 




  




* En arbetsmiljö där dina idéer och initiativ värdesätts.
* Goda möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
* Kollegor med ett stort engagemang och en stark laganda.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med samhällskritisk teknik som ständigt behöver finnas tillgänglig.
* En flexibel arbetsmiljö där du har möjlighet att arbeta i en hybridlösning - en kombination av arbete på vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm och på distans.



  





  





  





 DIN BAKGRUND
 



 Vi söker dig som både vill arbeta med kod och Systemarkitektur. Du är driven, målinriktad, gillar att samarbeta och sprida kunskaper till andra och du har en förmåga att förklara lösningar och få alla i teamet att jobba mot samma mål. Du är utvecklare i grunden och tycker om att jobba med kod men du vill även lyfta blicken och jobba med systemarkitektur.
 



  





  





**Kompetensmässigt söker vi dig som har:** 




  




* Fullstack: Goda kunskaper i C#/.Net
* Erfarenhet av Systemdesign
* Erfarenhet av integrations och/eller kommunikation. Telekomerfarenhet är också användbart.
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* Arbeta på Stockholmskontoret några dagar i veckan



  





  





 Hos oss är våra värderingar,
 **Professionella & Empatiska** 
 samt
 **Ansvarstagande & Samverkande** 
 , något som genomsyrar hela kulturen på SOS Alarm och att du kan relatera till dessa är en förutsättning för att trivas hos oss!
 



  





  





  





 MER OM OSS SOM ARBETSPLATS
 



 Vi på SOS Alarm arbetar för ett tryggare Sverige för alla. Det gör vi genom att hjälpa människor i nödsituationer, hantera larm, koordinera arbete vid olyckor och kriser, samt genom att aktivt bevaka händelser och trender på nationell och global nivå. Vi gör allt detta i samverkan med våra kunder och partners - dygnet runt, årets alla dagar. Många är framför allt bekanta med vår leverans av det nationella nödnumret 112, men vi erbjuder även ett växande antal innovativa tjänster för både den privata och offentliga marknaden.
 



  





 Vi sitter i fina lokaler centrala Stockholm.
 



  





  





 ANSÖKAN
 



 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med House of Skills.
 



 Har du frågor? Kontakta gärna Linda Mukka (linda.mukka@houseofskills.se) eller Linda Freij (linda.freij@houseofskills.se).
 



  





  





 Urval sker löpande, så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
 



*SOS Alarm genomför säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll på sin personal enligt kraven ur säkerhetsskyddslag (2018:585). Även en kontroll enligt Lag (1974:191) om bevakningsföretag utförs och är aktiv under anställningsperioden. Drogtest utan anmärkning är en förutsättning för anställning. Tjänsten innebär även krigsplacering vid SOS Alarm.*

title: Chief Commercial Officer
company_industry: Financial Services and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**Chief Commercial Officer – B2B SaaS – FinTech – Nordic/UK – PE Backed** 









  





 Keen on working for Private Equity and having skin in the game?
 



  





 Do you thrive in
 **high-growth, professional** 
 environments?
 



  





 Are you a strategic, yet
 **hands-on** 
 commercial leader?
 



  





 We are looking for a result oriented
 **CCO** 
 to drive the enterprise sales for this 0-churn FinTech company with 70 employees, 40 MEUR ARR, healthy profits and sales offices in Helsinki, Copenhagen, Oslo, Stockholm, and London – and growing
 **.** 




  





 Some travel will be required.
 



  





 We are looking for these characteristics:
 


* **Charisma & People Skills**
* **Methodological and Data driven Approach**
* **Top Executive Selling and Negotiation Skills**
* **Relevant Network**



  





**Excited?** 




  





 Reach out to
 **Rita Kolmannskog Holst** 
 at Panamera IMD via
 **rita@panamera-search.no**
 . Include
 **“CCO FinTech B2B + [Your Name]”** 
 in the subject line.
 



  





 We value diversity and encourage you to get in touch if you feel qualified. We look forward to hearing from you and building a mutually beneficial long-term relationship.

title: Senior Backend Engineer (AI / Fintech)
description:
**About Njorda** 

 Njorda is an
 **AI-native fintech** 
 building a next-generation investment app to help people make smarter financial decisions. We combine real-time data, machine learning, and innovative visualizations to let anyone invest like a pro.
 



  





 We’re looking for a senior backend engineer to join our team and help shape the core infrastructure that powers everything from data ingestion to AI-driven insights.
   




**Profile** 
* Senior backend engineer with 5+ years of experience
* Passionate about AI-driven fintech solutions
* Excited to work in a fast-moving, innovation-focused environment


**The Role** 

 As a Senior Backend Engineer, you'll play a key role in building the core infrastructure powering our
 **AI-native investment app** 
 . You will:
 


* Design and maintain APIs, services, and data pipelines that support real-time investment analytics
* Build and maintain robust, scalable APIs consumed by our
 **frontend team**
* Ensure the performance, reliability, and security of our cloud platform (
 **GCP** 
 )
* Collaborate daily with frontend engineers and product owners in our small, agile team (11 people)
* Contribute to technology decisions, architectural design, and backend best practices


**Who We're Looking For** 

 We prioritize hiring fast learners and technically strong developers who can adapt quickly.
 


* You're passionate about applying technology to solve real-world problems in finance and investing
* You thrive in a fast-paced startup environment and are excited by the challenge of building an AI-first product
* You're a proactive problem-solver with strong technical foundations and a desire to learn and adapt


**Skills & Experience** 
* Strong proficiency in
 **Python** 
 for backend development
* Experience working with
 **large language models (LLMs)** 
 and
 **prompt engineering/evaluation** 
 techniques
* Familiarity with
 **AI agent frameworks** 
 and orchestration tools
* Practical experience with
 **MLOps** 
 , including deploying and monitoring ML models in production
* Solid experience with databases (
 **PostgreSQL** 
 preferred), including data modeling and advanced SQL
* Proven ability to design, build, and maintain
 **APIs** 
 (we use
 **FastAPI** 
 )
* Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (
 **GCP** 
 preferred) and containerization (
 **Docker** 
 )


**What We Offer** 

 We offer the chance to shape the future of AI-driven investment tools from the ground up. You'll work with cutting-edge LLM technology in a fast-moving environment with significant impact and growth potential.
 


* A key role in a small, ambitious team building next-gen investment tools
* Real ownership, room to grow, and complex tech challenges to solve
* Hybrid work based in Stockholm (2–3 days a week in the office)

title: Mekanikkonstruktör
description:
*Vill du göra samhällsnytta och bidra till Sveriges oberoende i världen? FRA söker nu en kvalitetsmedveten konstruktör inom mekanik till tekniska avdelningen. Är du den vi söker kan vi erbjuda ett varierande arbete i en utmanande och innovativ utvecklingsmiljö. På FRA arbetar vi med unika uppgifter – för Sveriges säkerhet och integritet.*
**Om FRA**
 Omvärlden är FRA:s arena. Vår uppgift som underrättelsetjänst är att skydda Sverige mot de allvarligaste hot som kan riktas mot ett samhälle – militära angrepp, terrorism och cyberattacker. Vi gör det för att skydda det viktigaste vi har – vår trygghet, vår demokrati och vårt sätt att leva. Genom vår kunskap om omvärlden kan vårt land förbereda sig och möta hoten i tid. Vi är experter på cyberområdet och signalspaning och en larmklocka för militära hot. Vi är också i kärnan av det svenska cyberförsvaret och skyddar de viktigaste verksamheterna och den viktigaste infrastrukturen från angrepp. För att klara våra kärnuppdrag krävs avancerade tekniklösningar. Tillsammans har vi en unik uppgift, som vi löser med kunskap och kompetens som vi är ensamma om i Sverige.
   

  

 För din trygghet. För vår demokrati. Varje dag. Året om.
   

  

**Ditt uppdrag**
 Som konstruktör arbetar du med mekanikdesign i 3D-Cad i våra utvecklingsprojekt. Du ansvarar för antenn- och apparatkonstruktioner, dokumentation och beredning. Även hållfasthetsberäkningar och anläggningskonstruktion ingår i dina arbetsuppgifter. Du har ett nära samarbete med produktionsenheten, projektledare och installationsplanerare samt med externa leverantörer. Arbetet utförs i kontorsmiljö, men visst arbete på anläggningar och plattformar kan förekomma, vilket innebär resor inom Sverige.
   

  

**Du kan**
**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Högskoleingenjörsutbildning med inriktning mekanikkonstruktion.
* Flera års erfarenhet av mekanikkonstruktion.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
* B-körkort.


 Vi ser det som meriterande om du har några av dessa erfarenheter:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av konstruktioner för utomhusbruk.
* Erfarenhet av hållfasthetsberäkningar.
* Erfarenhet av svetsade stål/aluminiumkonstruktioner.
* Erfarenhet av frästa och bockade profiler.
* Erfarenhet av mekanisk konstruktion av mobila plattformar.
* Mekatronik erfarenhet.
* Erfarenhet av PDM-system och CAD-system.
* Erfarenhet av Inventor och Autodesk.
* Erfarenhet av CAM-programmering och styrning av verkstadsmaskiner.
* Erfarenhet av EMC konstruktion.


**Du är**
 Vi lägger mycket stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och söker dig som är prestationsorienterad, tar ansvar för dina uppgifter och strävar efter att leverera högkvalitativa resultat. Du är en strukturerad person som kan planera, organisera och prioritera arbetet på ett effektivt sätt för att möta uppsatta deadlines. Med din initiativförmåga och analytiska skicklighet tar du dig an komplexa problemställningar på ett konstruktivt sätt och kan samtidigt anpassa dig till förändrade omständigheter. Rollen ställer höga krav på stabilitet och uthållighet, att du i både med- och motgång har förmåga att fokusera på rätt saker samt behålla motivation och effektivitet. Då du har många kontakter både internt och externt bör du ha en god samarbetsförmåga, en serviceinriktad läggning och kan skapa och underhålla relationer på ett professionellt sätt.
   

  

**Vårt erbjudande**
 På FRA är varje arbetsuppgift en del av något större. På ett eller annat sätt får du som medarbetare vara med och bidra till att skydda Sveriges integritet och oberoende i världen. Du är med och gör skillnad på riktigt, varje dag.
   

  

 Våra medarbetare har hög kompetens, men vi kan alltid bli bättre. Därför är professionell utveckling en självklarhet för oss. Vi erbjuder möjligheter till kompetensutveckling. Som nyanställd får du bredda din kompetens direkt med en omfattande introduktionsutbildning som ger dig en större förståelse för uppdraget och hjälper dig in i verksamheten. Som medarbetare får du också möjlighet att hitta rätt utbildningar inom ditt specialområde för att bli ännu bättre på det du brinner för.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter god hälsa hos våra medarbetare och erbjuder bland annat friskvård under arbetstid. Andra förmåner som vi erbjuder är exempelvis friskvård om 4000kr/år, gratis parkering, möjlighet till ledighet på klämdagar, samt utökad föräldrapenning.
   

  

 Hos oss blir du en av de bästa. På ditt sätt.
   

  

**Mer information**
 Arbetsplatsen är belägen i närheten av Drottningholm, ca 10 min med buss från Brommaplan. Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav då anställning vid FRA innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Ett krav för att få anställning är godkänd säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll. Säkerhetsprövningen kommer att genomföras i enlighet med bestämmelser i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. Vi tillämpar sex månaders provanställning. För mer information är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef
 **Yvonne Gustavsson** 
 på telefon
 **010-557 44 01** 
 . Fackliga företrädare nås på 010-557 46 00.
   

  

 Vi tar emot ansökningar via www.fra.se
 **senast 2025-05-11**
 Referensnummer
 **2025FRA720-2** 
 .
   

  

 Då vi inför denna rekrytering redan tagit ställning till de rekryteringskanaler vi önskar använda undanber vi oss att bli kontaktade för ytterligare erbjudanden om annonserings- och rekryteringshjälp.

title: Freelance Artificial Intelligence Expert - AI Tutor (Talent pool)
description:
*The position may not be available immediately after you apply, but we encourage you to upload your CV if you're interested in participating. We have exciting projects coming soon with plenty of tasks, and we want to stay in touch with you. Once the role becomes available and you meet the criteria, you will be our priority candidate to join the project among the first, and we will reach out to you as soon as possible.*
**About The Company**
 At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.
   

  

**What We Do**
 The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Artificial Intelligence, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.
   

  

 Although every project is unique, you might typically:
   

  

* Generate prompts that challenge AI
* Define comprehensive scoring criteria to evaluate the accuracy of the AI's answers
* Correct the model's responses based on your domain-specific knowledge


**How To Get Started**
 Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.
   

  

**Requirements**
* You have a Master's Degree in Artificial Intelligence or a related field
* You have at least 3 years of professional experience in Artificial Intelligence or similar field
* Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
* You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
* Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


**Benefits**
**Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?**
* Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
* Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
* Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

title: Account manager
description:
**Account Manager till Livsstil24Gruppen** 




  





 Vi på Livsstil24Gruppen är ett framstående och innovativt företag som inte bara skapar annonser, utan vi levererar värdefullt och engagerande innehåll till våra kunder. Vi arbetar tillsammans med Aftonbladet för att skapa både tryckta bilagor och digital annonsering som verkligen fångar och engagerar. Nu söker vi en driven och strategisk Säljare som vill vara med och ta vår verksamhet till nästa nivå.
 



  





**Om rollen:** 




 Som Account Manager hos oss kommer du att spela en central roll i att bygga och utveckla långsiktiga kundrelationer. Du ansvarar för egen försäljning och att driva din egen kundstock, samt fokuserar på att värva nya kunder. Genom att identifiera deras behov skapar du skräddarsydda annonseringslösningar för både tryck och digitala kanaler. Du erbjuder effektiva lösningar som hjälper nya och befintliga kunder att nå sina mål, och du bidrar till företagets tillväxt och framgång. Du blir en viktig del av vårt team och en drivande kraft i vår fortsatta expansion.
 



  





*Dina arbetsuppgifter:* 



* Värva nya kunder.
* Identifiera kundernas behov och skapa skräddarsydda annonseringslösningar.
* Arbeta nära vårt kreativa och digitala team för att säkerställa att vi levererar högkvalitativa och effektiva lösningar.
* Genomföra förhandlingar och säkerställa att kundernas mål och förväntningar uppfylls.
* Arbeta mot uppsatta mål och driva resultat genom att engagera kunder i långsiktiga samarbeten.



  





*Vi söker dig som:* 



* Har erfarenhet av försäljning och relationer med nyckelkunder, gärna inom B2B eller annonsering.
* Är lösningsorienterad och kan tänka strategiskt för att skapa värde för kunderna.
* Har erfarenhet av digital annonsering och tryckt media.
* Är självgående, resultatorienterad och har en stark drivkraft att nå och överträffa mål.
* Har god kommunikationsförmåga och trivs med att bygga långsiktiga affärsrelationer.



  





*Vi erbjuder:* 



* En nyckelroll i ett dynamiskt och expansivt företag.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med spännande och varierande kund projekt.
* Ett professionellt och stöttande team som ser till att du har alla verktyg för att lyckas.
* Stora möjligheter för personlig och professionell utveckling.
* Individuell lön



  




* Är du redo att ta din karriär till nästa nivå och skapa engagerande lösningar för våra kunder? Skicka din ansökan till:
 ***simon@livsstil24gruppen.se***

title: PHP Developer
description:
Do you want to help us unleash the secret to how happy employees create a happy business? We are an innovative, agile, and continuously growing modern tech company on a path to improving the work lives of millions around the world.
   

  

**We develop workforce management solutions** 
 - software that makes scheduling and time reporting more smooth and more flexible for almost a million users worldwide!
   

  

****We value passion, quality, innovation, trust, and collaboration** 
 .** 
 You’ll be given the opportunity to make an impact and directly contribute to our success, bring new ideas, and have full ownership of your area.
   

  

 Our global team, of more than 35 nationalities, have fun together, whether it is during a typical Swedish Fika, a workshop, going for a run with a colleague, or spending time together during team kickoffs, or after-work socials. We have built a collaborative and friendly atmosphere here at Quinyx and are committed to sharing knowledge and supporting one another!
   

  

 Are you curious and ready to take the first steps on an awesome journey and make magic happen with us? As a member of Quinyx, you will be part of an inclusive and diverse workplace where everyone is allowed to be themselves and thrive.
   

  

**We have a hybrid working set up and therefore you will be required to attend our Stockholm** 
**office twice per week.**
**About The Role**
 We are looking for an experienced PHP developer with a strong technical background to join our fantastic Core team.
   

  

 You will work in the Core team as a PHP developer, creating new features, API endpoints, fixing bugs, and refactoring existing functionality.
   

  

 The team consists of seven PHP developers and two QA members working together.
   

  

 In our project ecosystem, apart from PHP services, we also have services built with Java, so you will have the opportunity to work with new technologies and learn new skills.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Working in a self-managing team based on Agile principles
* Implementing new and maintaining existing functionality in our services built with pure PHP and Laravel
* Refactoring codebase to enhance performance and security
* Participating in planning, discovering solutions and initiating innovations


**What You’ll Bring To The Team**
* Multiple years of experience in PHP development
* Skills in high-performance scalable system development
* Strong set of soft skills, including effective communication, teamwork, and problem-solving abilities.
* Excellent English, both spoken and written


**The WOW-factor**
* Knowledge of Java, Cloud technologies, and experience with high-loaded systems is a plus.
* You enjoy working in a highly independent, cross-functional team with a never-ending drive to deliver great software, with a special focus on performance, maintainability, and usability. You achieve this by understanding our users' needs and cooperating effectively with the team.
* Experience with handling technical debt and working with legacy code is a plus.


**What’s in it for you?**
 We promote and encourage a healthy lifestyle with flexible work hours and the latest tools, enhanced vacation allowance, wellness, home office, professional development contributions, virtual yoga classes, and last but not least, you will have the chance to participate in our well-known yearly ping-pong tournament!
   

  

**Want to join Quinyx?**
 At Quinyx, we provide equal employment opportunities and strive for an inclusive, diverse, value-driven culture. All applications will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, disability, or veteran status.
   

  

**Happy Workforce, Happy Business!**
***All candidates are subject to background checks.***

title: Cloud Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and IT System Custom Software Development
description:
**Cloud Engineer | Stockholm | Modern Tech Consultancy** 




  





 My client, a fast growing Boutique consultancy, based in the heart of Stockholm to scale their business massively over the next year.
 



  





***What sets them apart?***
